title: ‘The Great British Bake Off’ Season 9, Episode 3: “Bread Week” | Everything Is Cake
description:
It’s that make-or-break moment for the bakers in the bubble: Bread Week. We discuss our favorite bread bakes from seasons past (0:30) before getting into all the details of a very on-trend focaccia signature challenge (4:40), a dastardly ciabatta technical challenge (13:30), and a very cute milk bread showstopper challenge (18:45). Then we hand out our awards for the soggiest bottom, best Matt moment, best sound bites, and more (35:50).
Hosts: Kate Halliwell and Amelia Wedemeyer
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
